message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $900,000. This offer represents a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
